aboutPerson.tagline: Web developer, avid gamer and trophy collector.
aboutPerson.description: Hello â€” I'm John, I enjoy building practical projects that help improve gamers lives. This app was first built as a friendly joke by gamers at Trinity College in Dublin. But we noticed the potential of this app and decided to share our idea with the world. If you encounter any issues, have a question or have an idea for improvement of our app, please dont hesitate to contact us!
